page.title: 07ROYDEN HILL FARM,SHARLOW
page.content: MR.G.CLIFTON OF ROYDEN HILL FARM USED TO FARM ABOUT 1000 ACRES.BECAUSE NONE OF HIS SONS WISHED TO BE FARMERS HE HAS NOW SOLD MOST OF THE LAND TO A NEIGHBOURING FARMER.THE LAND WHICH HE SOLD IS MOSTLY COVERED BY RAPE THIS YEAR.MR CLIFTON HAS RETAINED ABOUT 60 ACRES AROUND HIS FARMHOUSE.HE USES THIS FOR GRAZING ABOUT 40 SHEEP AND LAMBS.THE REST OF HIS LAND IS WINTER WHEAT (30 ACRES) ,POTATOES (3 ACRES) AND WINTER BARLEY (2 ACRES). MR. CLIFTON HAS LARGELY CHANGED HIS OCCUPATION FROM FARMER TO PLEASURE BOAT OWNER. HE HAS BOUGHT A NEW PLEASURE BOAT COSTING Â£ 5O,OOO NAMED AQUARIUS 2. IT IS 65 FEET LONG AND ll FEET WIDE. IT CAN CARRY 6O PASSENGERS AND HE USES IT TO MAKE TRIPS UP AND DOWN THE TRENT AND MERSEY CANAL.MANY YEARS AGO THE SCHOOL HAD A BARGE BUT IT WAS VERY OLD AND SANK.
